fields.label: Video
fields.name: video
fields.instructions: Paste the video embed code here. Make sure to remove any tags besides the iframe.

fields.label: Blocks
fields.name: blocks
fields.instructions: Blocks provide a structure for your content.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: block_heading
sub_fields.instructions: This will render as an <h3>. Leave blank if no heading is necessary.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: block_text
sub_fields.instructions: Add text content here. It will display in a column at the center of the page. Take care to use the headings appropriately, and use minimal formatting.

sub_fields.label: Text Format
sub_fields.name: textimage_format
sub_fields.instructions: What format should the text be?

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: textimage_paragraph
sub_fields.instructions: The text will display in a paragraph format next to the image. The paragraph text should be related to any text above and below.

sub_fields.label: Caption
sub_fields.name: textimage_caption
sub_fields.instructions: The caption to be displayed next to the image.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: textimage_image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an image. If a caption format, it's dimensions should be approximately 800x600. If paragraph, it is best to be the height of the text, likely taller than wide.

sub_fields.label: List Title
sub_fields.name: list_title
sub_fields.instructions: Only needed if it requires separation from the previous block. Limit to a few words, something like "Our Services".

sub_fields.label: List Type
sub_fields.name: list_type
sub_fields.instructions: Would you like to connect existing content, or create customized text?

sub_fields.label: List Display
sub_fields.name: list_display
sub_fields.instructions: Major is recommended for items with photos, Minor for items with icons.

sub_fields.label: List Description
sub_fields.name: list_description
sub_fields.instructions: A few sentences introducing this list. Optional.

sub_fields.label: Free Form List
sub_fields.name: list_type_freeform
sub_fields.instructions: Create a free form list of items with text and a accompanying images.

sub_fields.label: SVG
sub_fields.name: item_svg
sub_fields.instructions: Add the name of an SVG here if you are using one e.g. 'facebook-icon'. The "Image" field can then be left blank.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: item_description
sub_fields.instructions: A 2-3 sentence description of the item.

sub_fields.label: Connected Content
sub_fields.name: list_type_connected_content
sub_fields.instructions: Show a list of connected content.

sub_fields.label: Shortcode/HTML
sub_fields.name: html
sub_fields.instructions: This block should be used for a shortcode or embed code, and not for text or image content. For example, you could add a SoundCloud clip or YouTube video.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: cta_heading
sub_fields.instructions: A heading for the call to action.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: cta_text
sub_fields.instructions: Something like "Get in touch to request a quote or just to say hi." Tweet length.

fields.label: Assignments Summary
fields.name: assignments_summary
fields.instructions: A brief summary for the assignments content.

fields.label: Assignment Blocks
fields.name: assignment_blocks
fields.instructions: Blocks provide a structure for your content.
